name: Appsmith
description: Appsmith is an open-source platform to build and deploy internal tools or admin panels.

APPSMITH_MONGODB_URI.description: Your Mongo Database URI. Since Heroku doesn't support a managed MongoDB instance, you'll have to create a Mongo DB instance on another service such as https://cloud.mongodb.com

APPSMITH_ENCRYPTION_PASSWORD.description: Encryption password to encrypt all sensitive credentials in the database. You can use any random string (Eg. abcd). The more random, the better.

APPSMITH_ENCRYPTION_SALT.description: Encryption salt used to encrypt all sensitive credentials in the database. You can use any random string (Eg. abcd). The more random, the better.

APPSMITH_MAIL_ENABLED.description: Set this value to true to enable email sending

APPSMITH_MAIL_FROM.description: Email ID using which emails will be sent from your installation

APPSMITH_REPLY_TO.description: Email ID to which all email replies will be sent to

APPSMITH_MAIL_HOST.description: The host endpoint for the SMTP server

APPSMITH_MAIL_SMTP_TLS_ENABLED.description: Set this value to enable TLS for your SMTP server

APPSMITH_MAIL_SMTP_AUTH.description: Set this value to true if your SMTP server requires authentication

APPSMITH_OAUTH2_GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID provided by Google for OAuth2 login

APPSMITH_OAUTH2_GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client secret provided by Google for OAuth2 login

APPSMITH_OAUTH2_GITHUB_CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID provided by Github for OAuth2 login

APPSMITH_OAUTH2_GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client secret provided by Github for OAuth2 login

APPSMITH_GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY.description: Google Maps API key which is required if you wish to leverage Google Maps widget. Read more at: https://docs.appsmith.com/v/v1.2.1/setup/docker/google-maps

APPSMITH_RECAPTCHA_SITE_KEY.description: Google reCAPTCHA v3 site key, it is required if you wish to enable protection against spam/abusive users. Read more at: https://developers.google.com/recaptcha/docs/v3

APPSMITH_RECAPTCHA_SECRET_KEY.description: Google reCAPTCHA v3 verification secret key, it is required if you wish to enable spam protection in your backend server.

APPSMITH_RECAPTCHA_ENABLED.description: Boolean config to enable or disable Google reCAPTCHA v3 verification feature. If set to true, both site key and secret key should be provided.

APPSMITH_DISABLE_TELEMETRY.description: We want to be transparent and request that you share anonymous usage data with us. This data is purely statistical in nature and helps us understand your needs & provide better support to your self-hosted instance. You can read more about what information is collected in our documentation https://docs.appsmith.com/v/v1.2.1/setup/telemetry
